upcomingEvents.title: Women's Rosh Chodesh Social
upcomingEvents.description: Join Rebbetzin Liran Messinger monthly to celebrate Rosh Chodesh with Torah, snacks, and drinks! (Note: This event is open to all non-male identified folks who are comfortable in a female centered space).

upcomingEvents.title: Shtiebel Sundays
upcomingEvents.description:
Join us on Sundays for a rotating lineup of events! Each week, we'll open the ONLY kosher caf√© in Harlem, offering coffee and a selection of sweet treats for all to enjoy. 
We're excited to launch this initiative in mid-December, featuring Hebrew-speaking hours, an art gallery, and a family Hanukkah party! Interested in showcasing a program at the Shtiebel? Get in touch!

calendar.title: Monthly Calendar (example of what we can put here)

getInvolved.title: Get Involved
getInvolved.description: Want to help organize events or have an idea for a program? We'd love to hear from you!
